content: And to whom [if not us] has the arm  infinite power of the  been revealed?
For He [the Servant of God] grew up before Him like a tender shoot (plant),
And like a root out of dry ground;
He has no  form or  splendor
That we would look at Him,
Nor [handsome] appearance that we would be attracted to Him.
He was despised and rejected by men,
A Man of sorrows  pain and acquainted with grief;
And like One from whom men hide their faces
He was despised, and we did not appreciate His worth  esteem Him.
